## MiddlewareRegistry interface

A context that allows middleware registration

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface MiddlewareRegistry 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [expressMiddleware(key, middleware, options)](./express.middlewareregistry.expressmiddleware.md) | Bind an Express middleware to this server context |
|  [expressMiddleware(middlewareFactory, middlewareConfig, options)](./express.middlewareregistry.expressmiddleware_1.md) | Bind an Express middleware to this server context |
|  [middleware(middleware, options)](./express.middlewareregistry.middleware.md) | Register a middleware function or provider class |
